mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,cukoujidi.cukoujidi_name as cukoujidiName ,cukoujidi.cukoujidi_dizhi as cukoujidiDizhi ,cukoujidi.jidiqiye_types as jidiqiyeTypes ,cukoujidi.cukoujidi_photo as cukoujidiPhoto ,cukoujidi.cukoujidi_content as cukoujidiContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.sex_types as sexTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.role as role
FROM cukoujidi_collection a left JOIN cukoujidi cukoujidi ON a.cukoujidi_id = cukoujidi.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.cukoujidi_id = #{params.cukoujidiId}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and DATE_FORMAT(a.insert_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.insertTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.insert_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.insertTimeEnd} , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and cukoujidi.cukoujidi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.cukoujidiName},'%')
and cukoujidi.cukoujidi_dizhi like CONCAT('%',#{params.cukoujidiDizhi},'%')
and cukoujidi.jidiqiye_types = #{params.jidiqiyeTypes}
and cukoujidi.cukoujidi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.cukoujidiContent},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.role like CONCAT('%',#{params.role},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
